passage: Nelson Dock Pier is the official name of a pier on the south bank of the River Thames in Rotherhithe, London, UK. It lies to the south of Columbia Wharf. In addition to this, King's Stairs Gardens is another riverside location in Rotherhithe.

passage: Until 1968 the Kleine Weser and the Werdersee were part of the river Weser in Bremen, Germany. In a similar vein, the Schlachte is an area on the river Weser which forms another part of the Bremen cityscape.
